abstract: Sanofi plans to begin marketing Multaq, generically known as dronedarone, in the United States this summer.
snippet: Sanofi plans to begin marketing Multaq, generically known as dronedarone, in the United States this summer.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration approved a new drug Thursday to treat the heart rhythm disorder known as atrial fibrillation, which affects an estimated 2.5 million people in this country, most of them elderly.

headline.main: Sanofi Drug for Heart Rhythm Disorder Is Approved
headline.print_headline: Sanofi Drug for Heart Rhythm Disorder Is Approved
